"Starting Emergency Quests": "You can begin an Emergency Quest by travelling to the Section in which the Quest is located, then <yellow>pressing and holding the <%Access> button<c>."
"Alternatively, you can open the World Map by selecting <yellow>\"World\"<c> from the Main Menu, then select the red marker to begin an Emergency Quest."

"Before you can begin an Emergency Quest, your Power Level must be high enough.

When an Emergency Quest occurs, you can see the Power Level needed from the Quest Information window or from the announcement scrolling across the top of the screen."
